channel.title: Meme on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Meme on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Eight random things
item.description: In the spirit of Jeremy Keith’s post, here’s 8 random things I see about me: Black queen carved like Raven. Small brass Buddha. Wind up penguin. iPhone. Microformats pocket cheat sheet. Salt. 8.5 x 11 print out of the gMail “mvelope”. Label from a Christmas present: “To Steph Love, Joel, Jim & Mrs. A.” You’re it.
